parameters.name: membershipIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier for a membership resource.

parameters.name: analysisTemplateIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier for the analysis template resource.

nested_items.name: analysisTemplate
nested_items.description: The analysis template.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier for the analysis template.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the analysis template.

nested_items.name: collaborationId
nested_items.description: The unique ID for the associated collaboration of the analysis template.

nested_items.name: collaborationArn
nested_items.description: The unique ARN for the analysis template's associated collaboration.

nested_items.name: membershipId
nested_items.description: The identifier of a member who created the analysis template.

nested_items.name: membershipArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the member who created the analysis template.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the analysis template.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the analysis template.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time that the analysis template was created.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The time that the analysis template was last updated.

nested_items.name: referencedTables
nested_items.description: The tables referenced in the analysis schema.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: format
nested_items.description: The format of the analysis template.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The query text.

nested_items.name: artifacts
nested_items.description: The artifacts of the analysis source.

nested_items.name: entryPoint
nested_items.description: The entry point for the analysis template artifacts.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: The bucket name.

nested_items.description: The bucket name.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The object key.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The role ARN for the analysis template artifacts.

nested_items.name: sourceMetadata
nested_items.description: The source metadata for the analysis template.

nested_items.name: artifacts
nested_items.description: The artifacts of the analysis source metadata.

nested_items.name: entryPointHash
nested_items.description: The hash of the entry point for the analysis template artifact metadata.

nested_items.name: sha256
nested_items.description: The SHA-256 hash value.

nested_items.name: additionalArtifactHashes
nested_items.description: Additional artifact hashes for the analysis template.

nested_items.name: sha256
nested_items.description: The SHA-256 hash value.

nested_items.name: analysisParameters
nested_items.description: The parameters of the analysis template.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the parameter. The name must use only alphanumeric, underscore (_), or hyphen (-) characters but cannot start or end with a hyphen.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of parameter.

nested_items.name: defaultValue
nested_items.description: Optional. The default value that is applied in the analysis template. The member who can query can override this value in the query editor.

nested_items.name: validations
nested_items.description: Information about the validations performed on the analysis template.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of validation that was performed.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the validation.

nested_items.name: reasons
nested_items.description: The reasons for the validation results.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The validation message.
